reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: 1. Project: 11563 FCA Myanmar Country Office (MYACO)#2. Project area and Country: Myanmar#3. Project justification: #FCA Myanmar country programme will have a focus on promoting decent work and equal opportunities for women and youth and enhancing access t o assets and capabilities to protect, restore and develop livelihood. FCA will response to the deteriorated humanitarian situation in Rakhine with its partners who have access to the affected area. The country programme will continue to improve quality of education and to strengthen the capacity of youth and inter-faith networks. #FCAs field presence in Myanmar allows better response to changing needs and funding opportunities arising from the volatile country context and strong donor interest. FCAs presenc e is essential for increased impact and enhanced programme quality. It is in line with FCAs strategy and supports FCAs strategic goals related to programme development and quality, capacity building, advocacy, thematic/technical support, monitoring and div ersification of the funding base.#4. The main objective and expected results:#The objective is to improve effectiveness, quality and impact of FCAs Myanmar country programme through established field presence.#The expected results are: # Established a func tional working relationship and collaboration with UN agencies, I/NGOs, CBOs and government authorities at district and national level # New partnership and networking opportunities are created to broadening the funding opportunities # Effective coordinat ion of work and cooperation with other aid organisations # Capacity of local partners are built for effective and efficient programme implementation # Strategic and operational planning for the country programme including programme and project PMER and adm inistrative support #5. Right-holders/ beneficiaries: MYACO staff and partners, other stakeholders#6. Implementing partner: FCA Myanmar Country Office
